channel.title: CVE Feed for wolfSSL Inc. -- wolfSSH
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wolfSSL Inc. -- wolfSSH

item.title: CVE-2024-2873|2024-08-01T19:50:46.158Z -- wolfssl%20inc. -- wolfssh
item.description: A vulnerability was found in wolfSSH's server-side state machine before versions 1.4.17. A malicious client could create channels without first performing user authentication, resulting in unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2024-2873|2024-03-25T21:58:52.325Z -- wolfssl%20inc. -- wolfssh
item.description: A vulnerability was found in wolfSSH's server-side state machine before versions 1.4.17. A malicious client could create channels without first performing user authentication, resulting in unauthorized access.
